function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited systematic COVID-19 testing at a national scale in China, leading to exclusion of asymptomatic cases and potentially inflated mortality rates.","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of virus severity and potential underestimation of actual cases.","Mitigation":"Implement systematic testing at a national scale, including asymptomatic cases, to obtain more accurate data.","Technologies":"Testing technologies for large-scale, rapid, and accurate COVID-19 testing.","People":"Population in China, especially those in regions with limited testing.","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Use of satellite and ground station data to compute average air pollution measurements at the prefecture level in China.","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate or incomplete air pollution data which could impact environmental and public health assessments.","Mitigation":"Ensure the accuracy and reliability of satellite and ground station data, and validate measurements with on-ground observations.","Technologies":"Remote sensing technologies for air pollution monitoring, ground station monitoring, and data validation techniques.","People":"Residents and communities in prefectures where air pollution data is collected.","Owner":"Environmental and research organizations, government agencies, and data scientists."}]}
